TEXT.TITLE: UNIVERSITY PATENTS <UPT> LENS SALES RISE
TEXT.BODY: University Patents Inc said 4,344 of its Aleges soft bifocal contract lenses were sold in February, after allowances for exchanges and returns, up from 3,011 in January. It said 1,800 opthalmologists and optometrists were fitting the product last month, up from 1,600 a month before. Sales of the lens started in May 1986. Reuter
